body:
1. I think we'd want to be able to choose 1 or more per recipes. Sending EVERYTHING that might be interesting EVERY TIME seems like overkill.

2. Good point. If we are specifying on a per survey basis it's not a big issue, but probably nice to have for security reasons anyway.

3. Adding @rjweiss to comment. I think if we have a whitelist as discussed in 2 AND this is only available as needed per 1 we should be fine.

1. I think we'd want to be able to choose 1 or more per recipes. Sending EVERYTHING that might be interesting EVERY TIME seems like overkill.

  2. Good point. If we are specifying on a per survey basis it's not a big issue, but probably nice to have for security reasons anyway.
